shared.model.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.player.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a player playing the game. There can be up to 4 players in a single game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      A player bank is instantiated with the creation of each new player
      Player(PlayerInfo playerInfo) 
      Player(java.lang.String json)

        public boolean canTradeResource(ResourceType type)
        Checks if the player can currently trade using a given resource
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getTradeRatio

        public int getTradeRatio(ResourceType type)
        Gets the trade ratio of a resource based on what ports you have
        Parameters:
        type - resource type to check
        Returns:
        the ratio as an integer (returns 3 if you can trade 3:1)
